Home » 36P1 Dhammānuloma (1), Tikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (1) » 2 Kusalattika » 2.1 Paṭiccavāra » 2.1.3 Paccayānulomapaccanīya » Hetuduka
Tevīsaka (sāsevana)
Kusalattika
Paṭiccavāra
Paccayānulomapaccanīya
Hetuduka
Tevīsaka (sāsevana)
283Hetupaccayā ārammaṇapaccayā…pe…  purejātapaccayā āsevanapaccayā kammapaccayā āhārapaccayā indriyapaccayā jhānapaccayā maggapaccayā sampayuttapaccayā vippayuttapaccayā atthipaccayā natthipaccayā vigatapaccayā avigatapaccayā napacchājāte tīṇi, navipāke tīṇi.
<< Dvādasaka (sāsevana)up Terasaka (savipāka) >>
